issue.title: [JS] Make es2015 bundles the default
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12309](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12309). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
ES2015 is well supported now (https://caniuse.com/es6) so it makes sense to make it the default.

comments.body:
